mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "IsuQuery" o WHERE o."projectId" = #{prjId} AND "userId" = #{userId} AND NOT o.disabled AND NOT o.deleted ORDER BY "useTime" DESC LIMIT 6
mapper.insert: insert into "IsuQuery" (name, rule, descr, "projectId", "prjId", "userId", deleted, disabled, "useTime", "createTime") values (#{name}, #{rule}, #{descr}, #{projectId}, #{prjId}, #{userId}, FALSE, FALSE, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update:
UPDATE "IsuQuery" SET "useTime" = NOW(), "updateTime" = NOW()
WHERE id = #{id}
